markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rapid Mantel](/Feats.aspx?ID=832) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 265 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

You easily pull yourself onto ledges. When you Grab an Edge, you can pull yourself onto that surface and stand. You can use Athletics instead of a Reflex save to Grab an Edge.
name: Rapid Mantel

<summary>

</summary>
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 2" pfs="Standard" > Rapid Mantel Source Core Rulebook pg. 265 4.0 Prerequisites Expert in Athletics --- You easily pull yourself onto ledges. When you Grab an Edge, you can pull yourself onto that surface and stand. You can use Athletics instead of a Reflex save to Grab an Edge.
